page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT - HEDINGHAM
page.content: Most of our entertainments are of the amateur variety including pantomime and a play produced annually by Hedingham Amateur Theatre Society in Sible Hedingham. Many concerts and other performances are given in both Parish Churches and Village Halls. Whist Drives, Bingo and Discos are run usually in aid of various clubs and organisations quite frequently. We have very few commercial entertainments. The Bell Inn in Castle Hedingham houses a Folk Club which often has visiting professional musicians, and the 'Memories' Public House runs discos weekly and has occasional 'live' performances.
